name: elden-email-extension
description: Shows an Elden Ring banner when you send an email
author: Anna Mettifogo

scripts.build:chromium: mkdir -p dist/chromium && cp -r src/* dist/chromium && cp manifest_chrome.json dist/chromium/manifest.json
scripts.build:firefox: mkdir -p dist/firefox && cp -r src/* dist/firefox && cp manifest_firefox.json dist/firefox/manifest.json
scripts.build:all: npm run build:chromium && npm run build:firefox
scripts.package:chromium: npm run build:chromium && cd dist/chromium && zip -r ../../web-ext-artifacts/elden-email-chromium.zip . && cd ../..
